text: nad etim mirom i Posledney zhizn'yu. Oni sprashivayut tebya o sirotakh. Skazhi: «Delat' im dobro - khorosho. Yesli vy ob"yedinite svoi dela, to ved' oni - vashi brat'ya. Allakh otlichayet rasprostranyayushchego nechestiye ot tvoryashchego dobro. Yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to postavil by vas v zatrudnitel'noye polozheniye. Voistinu, Allakh - Mogushchestvennyy, Mudryy»
